name: Guns n' Bees 64
description:
Oh no - The evil honey mogul Mr. Honeymoney merged two beehives in an effort to maximize profit. Turns out the other bee folk isn't as friendly as you'd expect. One single bee takes it upon itself to get revenge on the evil Mr. Honeymoney. Embark on an epic journey to save your beehive and take down Mr. Honeymoney.

This game has been created over a duration of 2 weeks by a small team consisting of:

@blackblackberry

@trapper0711

@Timevortex

Slight spoiler on how to kill the different bosses:

Level 1: The Queen Bee needs to dash 3 times into the surrounding spikes.

Level 2: The bird needs to dash into the brick wall 3 times. (Sometimes the player can get into the way and therefore not damage the player)

Level 3: The human needs to be hit by his own hand, redirected at his body.
